song.englishname: The Ushering In Of The Magic Era

english.segment1: Writings found beneath the stairs. Where youth dares to crawl. Gasps and murmurs, muffled shrills. Phantoms trape the halls
english.segment2: The ushering, ushering in of the magical era
english.segment3: Statues of your ancestors. Speech in whispered tones. As Houdini reappears. To unmask a form
english.segment4: Magical, magical. oh oh. Magical, magical
